N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 101.8 - Certification

State Regulations

The Commissioner of Transportation adopts sections 24.601
through 24.603 and appendices
A
and
B
of part 24 of title 49 of the Code of

Federal Regulations with the same force and effect as though herein fully set
forth at length. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
101.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
